rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Hellkite Omnivore attacks, you may have it consume. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Hellkite Omnivore. When a creature is sacrificed this way, Hellkite Omnivore deals 3 damage to any target. [i](To consume, sacrifice another creature or exile a creature card from your graveyard.)[/i]
